type: Type of losgistics object, e.g. air waybill, booking, etc
typeCode: Commonly useed codes for document type, e.g. jfwb, jfhl etc. Leave nlank if unknown
issuedBy: Internet of logistics code of issuing party.
key: JSON field name of code that identifies this logistics object, e.g. 'waybill number', 'UPID' etc.

booking-head.ShipmentTypeCode: Total, part or split consignment indicator
booking-head.LoadTypeCode: Bulk or containerized (BLK or ULD) indicator
booking-head.DeckPosition: Position of the shipment in the aircraft - e.g. lower or main deck
booking-head.FlagConsolDirectLC: Shipment type indicator - e.g. D for Direct, C for Consolidation or L for Letter of Credit

reference-document.DocumentName: If no DocumentType provided, name of the referenced document

company.RoleCode: Company's role code - e.g. AA, AB...
company.RoleName: If no RoleCode provided, role name - e.g. Consignor, Exporter, Manufacturer, Carrier, FreightForwarder, Consignee, Importer, Payer, Payee, ShipTo, ShipFrom, BillTo, BillFrom, RemitTo, RemitFrom, Shipper
company.SecurityClassification: Security status - e.g. RA - Regulated Agent, KC - Known Consignor or AO - Aircraft Operator
company.Name: Name of company or organization
company.IATAcargoAccreditationNumber: IATA accredited cargo agent number or identifier
company.IATAcargoCASSnumber: IATA CASS cargo agent branch number or identifier
company.IATAairlinePrefix: IATA three numeric airline prefix number

IDother.Description: Description of ID - e.g. PIMA address, Account number, VAT/Tax id, Legal Registration id…
IDother.Issuer: Issuer of the company identifier - e.g. DUNS, ICAO, IRS, FR VAT, DE VAT, CCS…

company.RoleCode: Company's role code - e.g. AA, AB...
company.RoleName: If no RoleCode provided, role name - e.g. Consignor, Exporter, Manufacturer, Carrier, FreightForwarder, Consignee, Importer, Payer, Payee, ShipTo, ShipFrom, BillTo, BillFrom, RemitTo, RemitFrom, Shipper

company.IATAairlinePrefix: IATA three numeric airline prefix number

company.RoleCode: Company's role code - e.g. AA, AB...
company.RoleName: If no RoleCode provided, role name - e.g. Consignor, Exporter, Manufacturer, Carrier, FreightForwarder, Consignee, Importer, Payer, Payee, ShipTo, ShipFrom, BillTo, BillFrom, RemitTo, RemitFrom, Shipper
company.SecurityClassification: Security status - e.g. RA - Regulated Agent, KC - Known Consignor or AO - Aircraft Operator

company.IATAcargoAccreditationNumber: IATA accredited cargo agent number or identifier
company.IATAcargoCASSnumber: IATA CASS cargo agent branch number or identifier
company.IATAairlinePrefix: IATA three numeric airline prefix number

IDother.Description: Description of ID - e.g. PIMA address, Account number, VAT/Tax id, Legal Registration id…
IDother.Issuer: Issuer of the company identifier - e.g. DUNS, ICAO, IRS, FR VAT, DE VAT, CCS…

accounting.ItemValue: If no Item code provided, description of accounting item - e.g PAYMENT BY CERTIFIED CHEQUE…

SpecialHandling.Code: Special handling code following IATA standards
SpecialHandling.Description: If no Code provided, special handling description

waybill-line.Seller: Seller company details  - e.g. the party issuing the invoice
waybill-line.Shipper: Shipper company details - e.g. the party shipping the items
waybill-line.Buyer: Buyer company details - e.g. the party paying the invoice
waybill-line.Consignee: Consignee company details - e.g. the party receiving the items
waybill-line.Consolidator: Consolidator company details - e.g. the party consolidating multiple pieces
waybill-line.OtherParty: Other party company details - e.g. the party to be notified

Quantity.SLAC: Shipper's Load and Count - e.g. count of Items

Weight.GrossWeight: Gross weight of piece / package / ULD - total for the waybill line
Weight.ChargeableWeight: Chargeable weight - total for the waybill line

waybill-line.DeckPosition: Position of the shipment in the aircraft - e.g. lower or main deck

Goods.GoodsDescription: Generic text description of the goods
Goods.OriginCountryCode: Origin country ISO code of the goods

CommodityCode.Issuer: Issuer of commodity classification codes - e.g. Brussels Tariff Nomenclature, EU Harmonized System Code, UN Standard...International Trade Classification
CommodityCode.Name: If no CommodityCode provided, name of commodity

Rating.RatingTypeIndicator: Transportation rating type - e.g. F for Face, P for Published, or A for Actual Rating detail
Rating.CommodityItemNumber: Commodity identifier on which the rate class code is applied
Rating.RCP: City code of Rate Combination Point (RCP), the point over which sector rates are combined
Rating.ULDRateClassType: Unit Load Device rate class type
Rating.RateClassCodeBasis: Basis on which the Rate Class Code is applicable
Rating.RateReferenceCode: A unique code to indicate the applicable rate
Rating.RateReferenceType: Type of rate - e.g. contract, adhoc, etc.
Rating.SubTotalLineAmount: Total charge for this line item

invoice-line.LineType: Line type - e.g. ITM for Item, PCK for Packing, FRT for Freight charge, INS for Insurance charge for invoice charges breakdown
invoice-line.SubTotalAmount: Product subtotal before discount and tax - CALCULATED: Quantity x UnitPrice / QuantityForUnitPrice

Discount.BeforeDiscountAmount: Amount on which the discount is calculated - CALCULATED:  = SubTotalAmount
Discount.Amount: Discount amount - CALCULATED: BeforeDiscountAmount x Percent
Discount.Description: Discount reason description - e.g. Christmas Sale
Discount.SubTotalDiscountAmount: Total discount amount for this line - CALCULATED: Discount Amount + Discount OtherAmount

Tax.BeforeTaxAmount: Amount on which tax is applied - CALCULATED: SubTotalAmount - SubTotalDiscountAmount
Tax.Category: Tax category - e.g. StandardRate, Exempt from Tax (and by implication, the rate that applies, the actual percentage is dependent on the tax jurisdiction)
Tax.SubTotalTaxAmount: Tax amount - CALCULATED: BeforeTaxAmount x Tax Percent

invoice-line.SubTotalLineAmount: Total line amount after discount and tax - CALCULATED: SubTotalAmount - SubTotalDiscountAmount + SubTotalTaxAmount

customs-info.CustomsTransitStatus: Customs transit status / information / reference / code / SCI code

OtherCustomsInformation.CustomsSubjectCode: Customs subject code - e.g. IMP for import, EXP for export, AGT for Agent, ISS for The Regulated Agent Issuing the Security Status for a Consignment etc.  At least one of the three elements (Country Code, Information Identifier or Customs, Security and Regulatory Control Information Identifier) must be completed
OtherCustomsInformation.CustomsContentCode: Customs content code - e.g. Item Number I, Exemption Legend L, System Downtime Reference S, Unique Consignment Reference Number U, Movement Reference Number M

security-info.SecurityStatusDate: Date and time when the Security Status was issued
security-info.RegulatedEntity: Company and person details issuing the security status - e.g. with COMPANY SecurityClassifcication as RA - Regulated Agent, KC - Known Consignor or AO - Authorized Operator / Account Consignor

ReasonsForSecurityStatus.ReceivedFrom: Known Consignor or Account Consignor reference
ReasonsForSecurityStatus.ScreeningMethod: Screening methods which have been used to secure the cargo - e.g. VCK
ReasonsForSecurityStatus.OtherScreeningMethods: Other methods used to secure the cargo

security-info.AdditionalSecurityInformation: Ad hoc security statement required by state regulators

insurance.PayingParty: Party covering the insurance - e.g. Consignor, Consignee, Freight Forwarder…
insurance.InsurancePolicyHolder: Insurance policy holder details and contacts
insurance.InsuredAmount: Insured amount - amount covered by the insurance policy
insurance.Charge: Insurance charge - e.g. amount billed by the insurance company for the insurance policy

logistics-service-charge.ProductID: Carrier or Freight Forwarder logistics product / service code
logistics-service-charge.ProductName: If no ProductID provided, Carrier or Freight Forwarder logistics product / service name
logistics-service-charge.RatingTypeIndicator: Transportation rating type - e.g. F for Face, P for Published, or A for Actual Rating detail

ChargeDescription.LocationIndicator: Other Charge Location indicator - e.g. Origin (O) or Transit (T) or Destination(D)

SpecialService.DateTime: Special service scheduled date and time

ChargePayment.ByTime: Amount of time for which the charge is applied
ChargePayment.ByItemQuantity: Number of items for which the charge is applied
ChargePayment.PrepaidCollectIndicator: Other Charges payment indicator - e.g. at origin (prepaid) or at destination (collect)

Carriage.NoCarriageValue: NVD (No Value Declared) indicator when no value is declared for carriage

Customs.NoCustomsValue: NCV (No Customs Value) indicator when no value is declared for customs

Insurance.NoInsuranceValue: XXX indicator when no value is declared for insurance

Prepaid.TotalOtherChargesDueAgent: Sum of OTHER_CHARGE Amount due Agent / Forwarder (prepaid)
Prepaid.TotalOtherChargesDueCarrier: Sum of OTHER_CHARGE Amount due Carrier (prepaid)

Collect.TotalOtherChargesDueAgent: Sum of OTHER_CHARGE Amount due Agent / Forwarder (collect)
Collect.TotalOtherChargesDueCarrier: Sum of OTHER_CHARGE Amount due Carrier (collect)

InDestinationCurrency.TotalCharges: Total Charges converted to destination currency as per CURRENCY conversion rate
InDestinationCurrency.CollectionCharge: Collection charges in destination currency - e.g. additional amount charged for the service

event.FlagScheduledEstimatedActual: Flag to indicate whether this line is scheduled, estimated or actual (=performed)
event.DateTime: Date and time of the event
event.SequenceNumber: Sequence number of the event / movement for this piece
event.EventCode: Event or status code - e.g. DEP, ARR, RCS…
event.EventName: If no EventCode provided, event name - e.g. Loading, Unloading…
event.ServiceCode: Code to identify cargo products / service invoiced by carrier / freight forwarder
event.CarriageStage: Carriage stage - e.g. Pre-Carriage, Main-Carriage, On-Carriage. Always defaults to Main-Carriage
event.ModeCode: Mode of transport code following UNECE Recommendation N. 19 - Code for Modes of Transport

DataValidation.DataAcceptanceStatus: Status of data - e.g. Received, Processed, Accepted, Rejected
DataValidation.DataValidationStatus: Validation status of data - e.g. Acknowledged (data OK), Warning (error detected and corrected), Error (error detected)
DataValidation.DataErrorCode: MIP (Message Improvement Program) Error / Warning code
DataValidation.DataErrorDescription: If no ErrorCode provided, Error / Warning description
DataValidation.ErrorType: Type of error - e.g from the Message Improvement Program (MIP)
DataValidation.FieldPath: Field path from the root of the message / document  - e.g. EVENT.TransportDetails.OtherDetails

TransportDetails.TransportID: Airline flight number or rail / truck / maritime line id
TransportDetails.RegistrationID: Vehicle identification - e.g. vehicle registration number
TransportDetails.Type: Vehicle or container type following United Nations Directories for Electronic Data Interchange Code List
TransportDetails.Size: Size of the vehicle - free text
TransportDetails.SpaceAllocationDetails: Space allocation request / action / confirmation code or details
TransportDetails.DeckPosition: Position of the shipment in the aircraft - e.g. lower or main deck

DataLogger.DeviceName: Data logger's name - e.g. data logger manufacturer's brand and model
DataLogger.MeasurementParameter: Parameter that is being measured - e.g. temperature, humidity, location…
DataLogger.ThresholdMinValue: Minimum alert threshold to trigger warning if measurement falls below this level
DataLogger.ThresholdMaxValue: Maximum alert threshold to trigger warning if measurement exceeds this level
DataLogger.ThresholdMinAction: Free text - action to trigger if measured value falls below the ThresholdMinValue
DataLogger.ThresholdMaxAction: Free text - action to trigger if measured value exceeds the ThresholdMaxValue
DataLogger.ThresholdNotification: Company or person contact details for notification in case of value excursion

Measurement.Geolocation: Location details - e.g. geographic coordinates from GPS
